attributes.action: Cancel the second national lockdown in England
attributes.additional_details:
The restrictions have caused the following negative consequences: 

- Mass unemployment and job instability
- An increase in deaths from other causes due to lack of access to regular healthcare and support (rising deaths from heart disease, cancer and dementia)
- An increase in societal problems, including alcoholism, domestic abuse, drug addiction and loneliness
- A breakdown of social cohesion with people forbidden from visiting even members of their close family.
attributes.background: The government should lift damaging lockdown restrictions, which are ruining the economy and peoples lives. Further restrictions will exacerbate existing problems and should not be implemented.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Repeal second National Lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045

Do not implement a second national lockdown or other restrictions this winter: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549862

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
